price: (Ɔbͻfoͻ no) kaa sε: “Medeε meyε wo Wura Nyankopͻn bͻfoͻ; (Wasoma me) sε menfa abarimaa kronkron bi mεkyε wo “.
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ رَسُولُ رَبِّكِ لِأَهَبَ لَكِ غُلَٰمٗا زَكِيّٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla innamā anā rasūlu rabbiki li-ahaba laki ghulāman zakiyyan
